executiveSummary: Ken Hovy, Monique Kefir, and Ryan Gay from Flated pitched their inflatable automotive accessories to the Sharks, seeking $350,000 for 5% equity. After several Sharks declined due to valuation and growth concerns, Damon John offered $350,000 for an 8% royalty per unit sold, dropping to 5% after recouping his investment, which the founders accepted.
keyDecisions: Flated accepted Damon Johnâ€™s offer of $350,000 for an 8% royalty on each unit sold, reducing to 5% after repayment.

actionItems.task: Finalize partnership and contractual terms with Damon John
Use new funding to address inventory and cash flow issues
Develop marketing strategies to increase sales and brand trust

nextSteps: Flated will collaborate with Damon John to scale production, improve marketing reach, and optimize operations to increase sales and brand credibility.
